const callN8nWebhook=async ideaText=>{// Validate input
if(!ideaText||ideaText.trim().length===0){throw new Error('Invalid input: idea text is required');}if(ideaText.length>5000){throw new Error('Input too long: please limit your idea description to 5000 characters');}// Check if webhook URL is configured
